content:
I’m a video producer and software engineer based in New York City and co-founder of Fractal Media, a digital video agency. I work on a variety of projects, from original YouTube videos to motion graphics to Python software development.
I’m interested in the intersection between creativity and technology. My career aim at the moment is to explore the possiblities of creative video production using cutting edge computer vision tools.
Please see below for highlighted projects and feel free to reach out! Resume available upon request.
